name: San Gabriel
shortDescription: A historic city in the San Gabriel Valley known for its rich cultural heritage and the famous San Gabriel Mission.
fullDescription: San Gabriel is celebrated for its blend of cultural history and suburban charm. The city is home to the historic San Gabriel Mission, beautiful parks, and a thriving Asian dining scene. With a walkable downtown area and family-friendly neighborhoods, San Gabriel attracts residents who value community, good schools, and convenient access to nearby Los Angeles and Pasadena. Its diverse population contributes to a vibrant cultural atmosphere and numerous local festivals.
heroImageAlt: Historic San Gabriel Mission surrounded by greenery

neighborhoods.name: Alhambra
neighborhoods.description: City known for its cultural diversity and bustling dining scene.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Street view in Alhambra with palm trees and storefronts

neighborhoods.name: Rosemead
neighborhoods.description: A family-oriented city with parks, schools, and a growing Asian-American community.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Residential street in Rosemead with trees

neighborhoods.name: Temple City
neighborhoods.description: Suburban city with a focus on family-friendly amenities and community events.

neighborhoods.name: West Covina
neighborhoods.description: City with shopping centers, parks, and diverse neighborhoods.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: West Covina commercial area with shops

highlights.title: San Gabriel Mission
highlights.description: Historic Spanish mission founded in 1771 with beautiful gardens and a museum.

highlights.title: San Gabriel Park
highlights.description: Community park featuring walking trails, picnic areas, and sports facilities.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Green park area with trees and benches

highlights.title: Asian Dining District
highlights.description: A vibrant area known for authentic Chinese, Vietnamese, and other Asian cuisines.

highlights.title: Downtown San Gabriel
highlights.description: Walkable area with shops, cafes, and community events throughout the year.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Downtown shopping street with people walking

faqs.question: What is San Gabriel known for?
faqs.answer: San Gabriel is known for its historic mission, cultural diversity, and excellent dining options.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in San Gabriel?
faqs.answer: The real estate market is competitive with a mix of historic homes and newer developments.

faqs.question: What are popular things to do in San Gabriel?
faqs.answer: Visit the San Gabriel Mission, dine in the Asian Dining District, and explore local parks and shops.

faqs.question: How is commuting from San Gabriel?
faqs.answer: San Gabriel has easy access to the I-10 freeway and nearby public transportation options for commuting to Los Angeles and Pasadena.
